b: ^I Am Big, It's the Catering That Got Small
^You’re lucky, you can choose a correct ingredient before starting!
^Choose ingredients and actions based on what’s been told to you… and be quick!
^DOGRON: Uh, you should have lost, but you have the bonus that allows you to save yourself once ! Lucky for you, yes yes !

s0: ^ The Great Council of Pugs discovered that you cup recipes from. Nigella Lawson
s1: ^The Supreme Chihuahua has bitten your heel, repeatedly. You will die of rage
s2: ^Bruiser Woods entered the Grand Council and made Piiiietro win

non_ce_lhai_fatta: ^. THE GOOOOOOOOOD DOG for you ends here.
eliminazione_concorrente: ^DOGRON: Congratulations, you won at the expense of:
finale_cinque: ^DOGRON: You bring some metaphysical cooking here! What happened when youuuu finished cooking?

s0: ^ Pazuzu himself rises from the Underworld to ask you what horror you have cooked
s2: ^A black hole has opened in the control room, let's restart as soon as possible

finale_cinque: ^. I don't know why, but you are undefeatable!
finale_quattro: ^DOGRON: I'm still not sure if you can cook. How did it go today?

s0: ^ Everything is fine in the kitchen. Outside, the universe has been erased
s1: ^ I'm being warned that the planet has stopped turning
s2: ^ Who am I? Where did I come from? What was on my plate? Someone help me

finale_tre: ^DOGRON: I see your efforts today, and what abouuuuut what you cooked?

s0: ^ Out of the oven, the flan lets out heartrending cries
s1: ^The thing that was on my plate is dancing with the cameraman
s2: ^You cooked something that can throw me the ball

finale_tre: ^. You have won this challenge! See you tomorrow!

s0: ^ From the frying pan comes a smell of cyanide and sea water
s1: ^Why is there melted plastic on my plate?
s2: ^After eating it, I coughed and dropped a lung

finale_due: ^. But congratulations: see you in the next episode!

s0: ^ What's in the pan doesn't scream, doesn't move, and doesn't ask existential questions
s2: ^I know some students who might eat it, maybe

finale_uno: ^. Unexpectedly move on to the next installment!
finale: ^DOGRON: Uh, look at that beautiful devastation! Did you ever think you would win this program?

s: ^YOU: Of course, I'm the only person who actually cooked.
^YOU: You're not going to kill me, are you?
^YOU: Can I go home now?

g-0: ^DOGRON: Surprise: not a restaurant on Mercury, but, but, do you want to hear it?

s: ^YOU: The longer you take, the less I think I want to know.
^YOU: Yes, yes, yes!
^YOU: The important thing is to go home, please.

g-1: ^DOGRON: You will be the first person!

s: ^YOU: To do what?

g-2: ^DOGRON: To replace humans on our planet.
^DOGRON: Taking care of the Suuuuupreme Chihuahua, Pugs and of course a labrador sweet and very good pat-pat!

s: ^YOU: And what would this labrador be?

g-3: ^DOGRON: I don't like these jokes, no no.

s: ^YOU: Who is a good dog? WwwwwHO?

g-4: ^DOGRON: I am a good dog, a good dog!!!

s: ^YOU: And where is your home located?

g-5: ^DOGRON: A very simple planet. There are fire hydrants, gardens, rivers, lots of tennis balls, bunks, pizza trees and beer fouuuuuntains. I hope it's to your enjoyment.

s: ^YOU: Pizza trees?
^YOU: Beer fountains?
^YOU: Fire hydrants?
^YOU: Let's go!

c-11: ^DOGRON: Unfortunately, they growwwww up that way, even if we don't want to.

s: ^YOU: We're leaving, right now!!!

c-12: ^DOGRON: Yes! Do youuuu like them too? Don't tell me you're a doggo!

s: ^YOU: Macchè doggo! The Cult is allergic to water, they'll never catch me!

g-6: ^DOGRON: So, off we go! Our mission here is complete!

s0: ^And now, a welcome to all the contestants and those following us from home!
s1: ^Here wwwwe go again, contestants and spectators!
s2: ^Goooood evening to all the beautiful people on this planet and beyond!

s0: ^Competitors, remember that every day youuuuu will lose one of your abilities. Human person here in front of me! You will lose today, drum roll...
s1: ^What skill will we take away from our huuuuuman person today?!?
s2: ^Fewer and fewer people, fewer and fewer active skills!
s4: ^Me doggo big, not crying, no no, wooooof!

b: ^DOGRON: You will no longer be able to see the ingredients clearly.
^DOGRON: You no longer have an ingredient of your choice to select at the startof the game.
^DOGRON: If you get the recipe wrong, you won't have any rescue plans.
^DOGRON: You will no longer be able to eliminate another competitor.
^DOGRON: No power to recall a person who has left.
^DOGRON: I remind you dear person that you will be able to talk to one moreperson.

eliminatrice_choice: ^DOGRON: You have a chance to get rid of one of these beautiful people, who doyou want to get rid of?

s: ^YOU:BeBe.
^YOU:Piiiietro.
^YOU:Ugo and Mimi.
^YOU: That One
^YOU: Il Divo
^YOU: No person!

c-1: ^DOGRON: Piiiietro, my favourite number: you've been eliminated!
c-3: ^DOGRON: Oh. Oh. My friend, I hope you will forgive this competitor, but you mustleave. I will see you again in the endless meadow!
c-5: ^DOGRON: I like this way of reasoning!

resuscitatrice_choice: ^DOGRON: You want to bring a competitor back among us?

s: ^YOU:BeBe!
^YOU:Piiiietro!
^YOU: Ugo & Mimi!
^YOU: That One.
^YOU: Il Divo.
^YOU: MMM, I'm fine, thank you.

c-1: ^DOGRON: And here you go again: Piiiietro!
c-2: ^DOGRON: Mimi! How nice to have you here with us again!
c-5: ^DOGRON: Ah, uh, it seems cruuuuuel but that's the game, isn't it?

starting_test: ^DOGRON: Here we are little human person! I am super glad you are here with me and my new friends on this wonderful adventure!
^DOGRON: You will face five episodes of THE GOOOOOOOOOD DOG SHOW and I'm sure you will be the person who wins! I am sure of all the people actually!
^DOGRON: And that makes the program difficult, perhaps.

^DOGRON: Anyway: to get to know each other better, I'd like to ask you a few questions, just to see how you're doing in the kitchen, and figure out what kind of competitor you're going to be. Shall we start?

s: ^YOU: Sure!
^YOU: Do I have any alternatives?
^YOU: Where am I? What is happening? Who are you?

c-1: ^DOGRON: Of course, but then you would miss all the fun!
c-2: ^DOGRON: No, wait, with the test, I'll ask you the questions friend person!

domanda1: ^DOGRON: You're on an unknowwwwn planet, you've made a big mistake, and you don't know how to get back. What do you do?

s: ^YOU: Do I try to ask for help?
^YOU: Planet? No, seriously, why am I here?
^YOU: I sit in the corner and cry.

domanda2: ^DOGRON: All the people around youuuu talk about colors, but you haven't understood what they are. How do you try to understand something you don't understand so you don't get caught?

s: ^YOU: I don't know, I stopped studying at the three-table.
^YOU: But all these lights? And why does the chair smell like wet dog?
^YOU: I copy things other people do, hoping I don't screw up.

domanda3: ^DOGRON: Something with a long mustache short hair and the ability to get into boxes has destroyed your favorite game. How do you react?

s: ^YOU: I destroy everything you hold dear.
^YOU: But what does this have to do with a cooking contest?
^YOU: Strange, all this reminds me of Kitty.

domanda4: ^DOGRON: Someone you love very very much told youuuu he would be right back, but it's ten minutes later and still no sign of him. How do you deal with grief?

s: ^YOU: But are we here for therapy, or for a competition?
^YOU: If you don't release me right now I'll call my lawyer!
^YOU: I'd say it's time to get some sleep, chill out a little bit, catch up on the list of video games in the queue.

domanda5: ^DOGRON: What is your favorite gruel, but like the suuuuuper favorite thing in the world for you?

s: ^YOU: lamb vindaloo
^YOU: Please get me out of this place, please, what have I done wrong to you!!!?
^YOU: The end of capitalism.

domanda6: ^DOGRON: They take you to the playground. There's sunshine, lots of friends, and your favorite collar.

s: ^YOU: But where is the question?
^YOU: This is perfection!
^YOU: Uh, what kind of collar? Even a harness?

domanda7: ^DOGRON: It's been days that your tuuuummy hurts, your whole tummy. They put a leash on you and pat you on the trunk of the car. How do you react?

s: ^YOU: Please please free me I didn't do anything, my succulent plant will miss it!
^YOU: I am a brave person, I will meet my destiny!
^YOU: No fucking way. I bite their hand and escape to freedom!

domanda8: ^DOGRON: You buried someone, but you don't remember where you did it, and you're very sad, very. How do you react?

s: ^YOU: Oh. You're going to kill me, aren't you?
^YOU: No body, no crime. I'm sorry, Ermenegildo.
^YOU: I turn myself in to the police, voluntarily. Don't you think that's the sensible thing to do? You're going to do it right?

c-0: ^DOGRON: No no, what are you talking about, it's not like you're a hotdog!

b: ^DOGRON: The quuuuestions are over! And thanks to our very accurate psychology approved by the Grand Council of Pugs and the Supreme Chihuahua, I, Dogron The III I award you:
^DOGRON: the ability to notice the ingredients right away!
^DOGRON: the possibility of slowing down time.
^DOGRON: the luck of being able to choose an ingredient at the beginning of the recipe.
^DOGRON: the right to chat with an extra person in the lounge.
^DOGRON: the, um, uh, thepossibilityofskippingyourdeathonce uh look how beautiful a labrador!
^DOGRON: The right to kick another person out of the program who is here to contestantatan. Cronestant. Contrestant. Someone that is here to play.
^DOGRON: The power to recall the dead once. Woah!

day_one_lounge: ^DOGRON: Contestants, with this first episode of THE GOOD DOG SHOW today we will put youuuu to the test by asking you to...
^DOGRON: Coooooking something that you would eat every day!
^DOGRON: You have a few minutes to chat amongst yourselves, before buuuuut in thekitchen. Translated into the programme rules: a maximum of
^DOGRON: It's up to you to decide whether you want to share your secrets,trick other people, or get scratched! And be carefuuuuuuul, because in THE GOOD DOGeverything changes in the blink of an eye!

ugo_e_mimi_choice: ^UgoEMimi: Mimi, I decide when it's appropriate. And it just so happens thatthere is a lot of money here and I need a publisher!

s: ^YOU: Thank you ma'am, but the 1980s have been over since that day!

s: ^YOU: Good luck.
^YOU: I will beat you.

piiiietro_choice: ^Piiiietro: Bruiser Woods! Where did you go? Jesus, you took away my Gucci’s rosary too!
^Piiiietro: I told Snooki, oh if I told her, that it was a bad idea, but she didn't, no! Bruiser.

s: ^YOU: Bruiser Woods?
^YOU: Gucci’s rosary?
^YOU: Snookie?

c-0: ^Piiiietro: Yes, like that Bruiser, and I can't find it!
c-1: ^Piiiietro: Yes, a gift from my grandmother Scianel to celebrate my 16th birthday.
c-2: ^Piiiietro: Sorry, I signed an NDA, that's all I can say.
g-0: ^Piiiietro: She'll be back, I hope. This planet looks tiny anyway, there won't be any more doggies.

^Piiiietro: A fifteen the Navier-Stokes equations but I haven't received the Fields medal yet because after that Perel'man thing they are afraid of messing up.

g-1: ^Piiiietro: If I don't find the rosary, my grandmother will kill me, you know?
^Piiiietro: The whole family. They're all so religious, think they have a holy card of Miuccia Prada on the fireplace, blinking her eyes.
^Piiiietro: They forced me to study mathematics to confirm the existence of God and Donatella Versace.

s: ^YOU: And you are also a very good cook, then?

g-2: ^Piiiietro: Cook? What do you mean, cook?

s: ^YOU: Well, this is a cooking program, I think they kidnapped us etc etc.

g-4: ^Piiiietro: But I can just cook a plate of pasta with canned tuna and stir, the fuck am I doing here?

quello_choice: ^Quello: Hello lunar splendor! Don't you think this place is magnificent?

^YOU: Still better than the Worship Church, I think.

g-0: ^Quello: I feel a little bit of pressure, you know? All these professional people, and me being just a little pastry chef, as Il Divo always reminds me. Very very very small. Infimous almost.

s: ^YOU: Il Divo?
^YOU: Do you let him tell you these things?
^YOU: The most complex thing I've cooked is a caprese, and I lost a finger in it.

c-3: ^Quello: Yes, my boss, a strict but loving man in his own way. He forced me to come here, so if I win the money goes to his restaurant.
c-4: ^Quello: Every learner deserves the lesson of humility, don't you think?

g-1: ^Quello: Anyway pleasure, my name is That One. Sometimes It, sometimes That Other. People can be so creative.

s: ^YOU: By not hurting anyone.

g-2: ^Quello: Woah, you have the clearest ideas! I wanted to go for meringues, but Il Divo last time called them too meringue-y, and that's no good. He understands what's right in a blink of an eye!
^Quello: I only know how to make cakes, so I was thinking of taking some butter and a few other things, patiently whipping everything by hand and making some simple macaroon.

s: ^YOU: Simple. Sure. Simple.

g-3: ^Quello: Now I'm going to go clean the nails of Il Divo, who poor guy alone can't. See you later, it was nice talking to you. Talking, in general.

il_divo_choice: ^ilDivo: No no, no Oprah for me, I certainly don't stoop to her level!

s: ^YOU: You're talking to me?

g-0: ^ilDivo: Yes, to you, there are no other people around. Ah no, yes, I was on the phone with the secretary. Again. What do you have some special saffron?

day_two_lounge: ^DOGRON: But people friends, we are already on the second day of THE GOOD DOG (very very goooood dog!) SHOW!!! Aren't you super mega happy and wagging your tails!!!? Oh, hoooowwwww I would hate to see you all ever leave!
^DOGRON: But if we didn't eliminate someone, how could we find a perfect replacement for, for, for the larger kitchen of Uuuuuranus?
^DOGRON: And speaking of Uranus, today's theme is: a meal for when real friends come!
^DOGRON: I'll give you a few minutes for chit-chat and then we're off!

ugo_e_mimi_choice: ^UgoEMimi: Mimi, no, you're the one who doesn't understand! Kojima compared it to Skyrim! And Kojima is never wrong!

^BeBe: Just kidding, if the theme is "food for friendly people," of course I agree.
^BeBe: And you are a friend to me aren't you?

s: ^YOU: Of course I do!
^YOU: (lie) Of course I do!
^YOU: (ironically) Of course I do!

g-3: ^BeBe: That reassures me. I don't like people who take me by the ears.

g-4: ^BeBe: Sure. In friendship, sacrifice is important!!!

day_three_lounge: ^DOGRON: Good morning, everyone, and wwwwwelcome to the third episode of THE VERY VERY GOOD GOOD DOG SHOW!
^DOGRON: Don't you feel a little sadness? Already two people have left us, and I don't feel like making youuuuu leave, no!

^DOGRON: But the Supreme Chihuahua and the Grand Council of Pugs, in their wisdom they know that it is important to find the perfect mistress, no, the perfect little person for the restaurant on Satuuuuurn!
^DOGRON: And suuuuurely this magnificent person with magnificent hands that

s: ^YOU: I know I'm going to regret saying this, but you seem very quiet today.

g-0: ^UgoEMimi: Ugo spoke with one of the producers, for his video game.

^UgoEMimi: And he was told that the project lacks a coherent narrative, and a connection between gameplay, narrative and graphical elements.

^UgoEMimi: Mi hanno detto in sostanza che non ha senso! That it's a game where meaningless things happen! But I've been playing real video games forever! These are walking simulator pugs and visual novels!

s: ^YOU: What are you going to do now?

s: ^YOU: Oh, and I was afraid I was the only person who ate human flesh!
^YOU: I have too much junk in my body for my meat to be tasty.

c-0: ^BeBe: Oh yes of course, I'm so happy to be here!

g-1: ^BeBe: But, don't you find today's theme a little strange? In what sense "humans are all gone"? And then what are humans?

s: ^YOU: Um, am I a human person?

g-2: ^BeBe: Uh, that's why that hairless face, and the fact that he doesn't rumble! That's so funny. And where you come from there are sheep too?

s: ^YOU: Many, they are among the most common animals.

g-3: ^BeBe: In what sense, animals? Of course, it must be an evolved place, with so many sheep, well well well!

s: ^YOU: We raise them to eat, make wool, make milk.

^YOU: Well, they make good sacrificial animals for the Cult!

c-8: ^BeBe: Ah. I guess I'll go back to my stuff. Baaaaaaaaaay.
c-10: ^BeBe: In what sense? No, I don't want to know. I don't want to.

g-4: ^BeBe: Today I want to hit DOGRON: disappearance involves suffering, and suffering is overcome with pain. Therefore I will cook something by milking and then carding my own wool.
^BeBe: That's why I greet you now, and wish you the best.

piiiietro_choice: ^Piiiietro: Yet I was sure it was a D minor.

^DOGRON: Oh, are we on the air?
^DOGRON: Welcome to the fourth and penuuuultimate episode of THE VERY GOOD DOGGO GOOD DOGGO GOOD DOGGO! AND SHOW! Here is your favorite host, right I am youuuuur favorite host?
^DOGRON: Who is the best host in the world? Who is he?

^DOGRON: Or when they get a puppy and they tell youuuu that everything will stay the same but it's not true, that puppy starts walking, going to stuuuding and you got attached to it and he forgets about you.
^DOGRON: Today's theme is change, something to accept change.
^DOGRON: Another great idea from Supreme Chihuahua and the Pug Council.

s: ^YOU: Um, I think I left the cat in the oven.

g-3: ^BeBe: Acceptance. You have to accept it all. See you later, bye.

^Piiiietro: He thanks me for these years together, but he thinks it's time for him to be with someone who doesn't hide from others. Who doesn't pretend to be infinite, he says.

s: ^YOU: What do you mean?

g-1: ^Piiiietro: He's right, you know? You, you show yourself as you are, to the world?

g-2: ^Piiiietro: Gee, you've had an interesting life!
^Piiiietro: My... Bruiser is probably right, you know? I don't really live. I have to, I have to say things out loud. But it's so fucking scary for me to do that.

s: ^YOU: We've been kidnapped, we're on a planet the size of an Ikea store, we won't know what will become of us tomorrow. If you don't tell her today, when?

c-9: ^Piiiietro: When he has to say my name though, he gets wrapped up.

s: ^YOU: You look great, That One!

^Quello: It was the people, lazy people, who got rid of us vacuum cleaners in favor of those, those who are maybe my brothers, don't you think?

s: ^YOU: I just feel a great confusion in my head now.

g-2: ^Quello: I couldn't forgive my father, so I sought another one. I put my energy, my trust in il Divo. Another arrogant man.

^Quello: But I am a good person in me, don't you think? Even though we were all thrown into dumpsters. Even if my father created something to replace us all. Even if il Divo will never give me his approval.
^Quello: I am the one who has to approve himself, and that's it.

^YOU: What about me, who approves of me? You? Dogron? Who!?!?

g-3: ^Quello: Now I'm going to go to il Divo, and tell him I'm quitting. Also, I'm going to win this program!
